text: Lucidio Sentimenti (also known as Sentimenti IV; 1 July 1920 – 28 November 2014) was an Italian football player from Bomporto in the Province of Modena. He played club football for several clubs including Juventus and Lazio. He also played for the Italian national football team nine different times. Sentimenti died in Turin, Italy, aged 94.Calcio, è morto Sentimenti IV: fu il primo portiere goleador ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:1950 FIFA World Cup players Category:Footballers from Emilia- Romagna
title: Lucidio Sentimenti
